SA15sbpramvu:1733: upalambhāvyabhicārāt* ya evāyaṃ svabhāvasyābhāvaṃ niścaye dṛśyasya darśanetyādinokto 'yam eva hetur ve ///
SA15sbpramvu:1734_0: 5 /// .. dhye viruddhasya cetyādi caśabdo bhinnakramaḥ tadviruddhopalabdhau ceti
SA15sbpramvu:1734_1: draṣṭavyaḥ yasyābhāvaḥ sādhyas tena yo viruddhas tena yo viruddhas tasyopalabdhau
SA15sbpramvu:1734_2: ca syād asattāyāḥ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya niścayaḥ kiṃ kāranaṃ viruddhasya bhāvasya bhāve
SA15sbpramvu:1735: tasya niṣedhyābhimatasya sattābādhanāt* dravyoḥ sahānavasthānād iti yāvat* /
SA15sbpramvu:1739: 6 /// .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .i .. .. ity āha tadupādānayor ityādi tayor viruddhayor ya upādāne tayor anyonyaṃ parasparaṃ /
SA15sbpramvu:1740: dvaiguṇyaṃ tasyāśrayatvena śītopādānam uṣṇopādānavaiguṇyasyāśraya itarac cetarasyety arthaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:1741: tena kāraṇena viruddhayoḥ śītoṣṇakāryayor ekatra yugapadārambhavirodhāt* /
SA15sbpramvu:1745: yady apy atrānupalabdhir iti na śrutis tathāpīdaṃ svabhāvaviruddhākhyaṃ liṅgam anupalabdheḥ sakāśān na pṛthag ucyate /
SA15sbpramvu:1746: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tata evānupalambhād virodhagateḥ virodhāc cābhāvasādhanāt* viruddho hi kathaṃ niścīyeta /
SA15sbpramvu:1748: 2 /// palabdher abhāvāsiddher ity arthād viruddhavi .. ne 'nupalabdhir eva prayu .. .. .. .iti /
SA15sbpramvu:1749: bhavatu nāmaivaṃvidhāyāyā dṛśyaviṣayā anupalabdheḥ sakāśād abhāvagatir ataś ceyaṃ pramāṇaṃ sā punaḥ katham anumānaṃ kiṃtu pramāṇāntaram eveti bhāvaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:1750: kathaṃ vā na syād ity ācāryaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:1753: 3 /// .. .. .. .. mānaṃ dṛṣṭāntānapekṣatām edva na hītyādinā prāha /
SA15sbpramvu:1754: asyām ity anupalabdhau kiṃ na nirupākhyam ityādi ācāryaḥ dṛṣṭānta evety arthaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:1756: tad vyomakusumādi asad iti kathaṃ kena pramāṇenāvagantavyaṃ yenaivaṃ syāt* /
SA15sbpramvu:1757: anupalaabdher liṅgād abhāve sādhye dṛṣṭāntaḥ syād ity arthaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:1760: athātrāpy aparo dṛṣṭāntas tasyā vyomakusumādyasattāsiddheḥ sadṛṣṭāntatve vānavasthāprasaṃgaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:1761: tatrāpy aparo dṛṣṭāntas tatrāpy aparo 'pīti kṛtvā /
SA15sbpramvu:1762: tathā cānavasthāyāṃ satyāṃ ekasyāpi siddhāv apratipattiḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:1764: 5 /// .. labdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya anupalabdher ityādāv api prayoge dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṇād ananumānam anupalabdhiḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:1766: sakṛd uktaṃ yathā svabhāvānupalabdhau nābhāvaḥ sādhyate kiṃtu abhāvavyavahāra iti tacchṛṇvann api /
SA15sbpramvu:1767: mūrkhasya trīṇi nāmāni devo divyaḥ prajayatir ity ato devānāṃ mūrkhāṇāṃ pri .. ///
SA15sbpramvu:1771: sā nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ sadvyavahārāṇāṃ sānupalabdhiḥ svasannidhānād ātmanā sannidhānāt* /
